common.noTripsMessage: No trips were found for the selected time period. Try changing the date range or selecting a different vessel.

common.pleaseWaitWhileWeRetrieveTrips: Please wait while we retrieve your fishing trips information

auth.loginInfo: Enter your vessel's IMEI number or Boat name and password to access your tracking data.
auth.invalidCredentials: Invalid IMEI/Boat name or password. Please try again.
auth.enterBothFields: Please enter both IMEI/Boat name and password.
troubleshootingTips: Make sure your IMEI is exactly 15 digits long
Check that your boat name matches exactly how it's registered
Verify your password is correct (passwords are case-sensitive)
If problems persist, contact your system administrator
auth.demoModeDescription: Explore the app with sample data without needing credentials

dashboard.noVesselSelected: No vessel selected. Please choose a boat to view tracking data.
dashboard.noDataForImei: No tracking data is available for your vessel
dashboard.noDataForImeis: No tracking data is available for your vessel

catch.selectTripInstruction: Select the fishing trip you want to report catch for:

catch.chooseSpecificTrip: Choose a specific fishing trip to associate with your catch:
catch.noTripsAvailable: No fishing trips available for catch reporting.
catch.noRecentTripsMessage: No fishing events recorded in the latest 5 days
catch.quantityHint: Enter the total weight of fish caught in kilograms
catch.errorNoImei: Unable to identify user IMEI for this report
catch.errorInvalidQuantity: Please enter a valid quantity greater than 0
catch.errorSubmitting: Error submitting catch report. Please try again.
catch.errorNoValidCatches: Please add at least one fish group with a quantity greater than 0, or select 'No Catch'
catch.tripNotInList: Your fishing trip is not in the list?

catch.youCanAddUpTo: You can add up to 5 different fish groups
catch.photoTooLarge: Photo file is too large. Maximum size is 10MB
catch.addPhotosDescription: Take a picture or upload a photo of your catch
catch.photoLocationQuestion: Are you taking photos where the fish was caught?
catch.photoLocationDescription: Enable GPS to link photos with catch location
catch.reportQueuedMessage: Your catch report will be automatically submitted when connection is restored.
catch.reportSubmittedMessage: Your catch report has been successfully submitted and will be processed automatically.

network.dataWillBeSaved: Your data will be saved and submitted when connection returns.
network.uploadsMayTakeLonger: Uploads may take longer or be queued for later.

errors.payloadTooLarge: Photos are too large to upload. Please try with smaller or fewer photos.
errors.invalidData: Invalid data submitted. Please check your catch details.
errors.serverError: Server error. Your data will be saved and retried automatically.

api.noPerformanceFound: No performance data found for this time period

stats.title: My Stats

chart.title: Your Catch Trend (kg)
chart.startReporting: Start reporting your catches to see your trend here

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.noCommunityData: No other fishers in your community

performance.title: Performance Metrics
performance.noDataMessage: Keep using the app and reporting your catches to see your performance metrics here!

stats.noData: No data available for selected period
stats.tryDifferentPeriod: Try selecting a different time period
stats.noComparisonData: Not enough data for comparison yet

gps.permissionDenied: GPS permission denied. Please enable location access in your browser/app settings.
gps.androidInstructions: On Android: Settings > Apps > [Your Browser/PWA] > Permissions > Location
gps.positionUnavailable: GPS position unavailable. Please ensure GPS is enabled on your device.
gps.timeout: GPS request timed out. Please try again or check your GPS settings.

uploadManager.networkConnectionFailed: Network connection failed. Will retry automatically.
uploadManager.uploadTimedOut: Upload timed out. Will retry with better connection.
uploadManager.maxRetriesReached: Maximum retry attempts reached. Please check your connection and try manually.

demo.title: Demo Mode
demo.description: You are viewing the application with sample data
demo.dataSafetyNote: All sensitive information has been anonymized for privacy

welcome.title: Welcome to PESKAS!
welcome.subtitle: This app helps you track your fishing trips and understand your fishing better.
welcome.keyMessage: The more you use this app, the more useful information you get to improve your fishing!

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1Desc: Use your boat IMEI number and password to access the app
gettingStarted.step2Desc: Select English, Swahili, or Portuguese from the settings
gettingStarted.step3Desc: View your trips, report catches, and check your stats
gettingStarted.refreshDesc: Refresh the app regularly to ensure you have the latest features and improvements. Pull down to refresh or reload your browser.

viewTrips.title: View Your Fishing Trips
viewTrips.point1: See all your fishing trips on the map
viewTrips.point2: Different colors show your boat speed (slow, medium, fast)
viewTrips.point3: Click on any trip to see details
viewTrips.tip: Use the date picker to see trips from different time periods

reportCatch.title: Report Your Catches
reportCatch.whenDesc: Report after every fishing trip - even if you caught nothing
reportCatch.whatPoint3: OR select 'No Catch' if you caught nothing
reportCatch.photosDesc: Take photos of your catch. Photos help verify your catch and build trust.
reportCatch.whyDesc: Your reports create data that helps you see patterns and improve your fishing over time

myStats.title: See Your Progress
myStats.point1: View your total catches over time
myStats.point2: Compare your performance with other fishers in your community
myStats.point3: See which trips were most successful
myStats.point4: Learn which fishing methods work best for you
myStats.benefitDesc: Statistics help you understand what works and what doesn't in your fishing

liveLocation.title: Track Your Boat Now
liveLocation.point1: See where your boat is right now
liveLocation.point2: Useful for planning your next trip

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1Desc: Even zero catch is important data. It helps you see the full picture.
tips.tip2Desc: Photos make your reports more reliable and help build trust in the data.
tips.tip3Desc: Look at your stats every week to see your progress and learn patterns.
tips.tip4Desc: See if you're improving over time by comparing different time periods.

understanding.title: Understanding Your Data
understanding.point1Desc: The more trips you report, the more accurate your statistics become.
understanding.point2Desc: Use the information to make better decisions about when and where to fish.
understanding.point3Desc: See how your fishing compares with others to learn what works.
